full_summary:
### Government of Canada Tender Announcement

#### Hazardous Waste Disposal Services for Manitoba - Invitation to Tender

The Department of National Defence, 17 Wing Winnipeg, is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of Hazardous Waste Disposal services. The intention of this solicitation is to establish a two-year contract, commencing on April 1, 2024.

#### Background and Scope

The successful bidder(s) will be required to provide labor, materials, equipment, tools, and supervision necessary for the loading, transportation, and disposal/destruction/treatment of hazardous waste products listed in Annex B of the RFP.

Only a list of pre-qualified suppliers servicing delivery points in Manitoba under the Hazardous Waste Disposal Services Supply Arrangement (SA) number EW479-162880 will be eligible to submit proposals for this requirement. This list includes:

* CLEAN HARBORS CANADA, INC
* AEVITAS INC.
* STERICYCLE, ULC
* MILLER ENVIRONMENTAL CORPORATION
* GFL ENVIRONMENTAL INC

#### Proposal Requirements

RFP documents will be emailed directly to the pre-qualified suppliers who are invited to bid on this requirement. Bidders are informed that RFP documents are not available on the Government Electronic Tendering System (GETS) at [https://buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders).

For services requirements, bidders must provide the required information as detailed in Article 2.3 of Part 2 of the bid solicitation, in order to comply with Treasury Board policies and directives on contracts awarded to former public servants.

This requirement is subject to a preference for Canadian goods and/or services.

#### Additional Information

* Security requirements associated with this requirement are none.
* Bidders are advised to address their inquiries to Jacqueline Dalke, Contracting Authority, at jacqueline.dalke@forces.gc.ca.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

#### Commercial and Contractual Terms

* Trade Agreements: The bid is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement.
* Procurement Method: The procurement will be conducted using a competitive bidding process.
* Selection Criteria: The lowest
